A BRIEF ELECTION HISTORY1992: A coalition of independent state parties united to form the U.S. Taxpayers Party at its first national convention in New Orleans, Louisiana.  Among the notable convention speakers was former Congressman Ron Paul. The party‚Äôs founder, Howard Phillips of Virginia, Chairman of the grass-roots lobby, the Conservative Caucus, was nominated to be the party‚Äôs first candidate for President with retired Army Brigadier General Albion Knight of Maryland nominated as the party‚Äôs first vice-presidential running mate. The US Taxpayer‚Äôs Party secured ballot position in 21 states.1996: Howard Phillips was again nominated to be the party‚Äôs presidential candidate for the 1996 campaign at the party‚Äôs national convention held in San Diego, California.  Attorney and writer Herb Titus of Oregon was the Constitution Party‚Äôs Vice President nominee. Ballot access was achieved in 39 states for the 1996 elections, representing over 80% of the Electoral College votes available.2000: Delegates attending the National Convention in September 1999 voted to change the name of the US Taxpayer‚Äôs Party to ‚ÄúConstitution Party‚Äù to better reflect the party‚Äôs primary focus of returning government to the U.S. Constitution‚Äôs provisions and limitations.  For a third and last time, Howard Phillips was nominated to serve as the standard bearer for the newly named Constitution Party for the 2000 election. Missouri surgeon Dr. J. Curtis Frazier was the nominee for Vice President. The convention was held in St. Louis, Missouri.2004: The Constitution Party achieved ballot access in 41 states and, at its convention in Valley Forge, Pennsylvania, it nominated Maryland lawyer Michael Peroutka, founder of the Institute on the Constitution, as its presidential nominee with Florida minister and commentator Chuck Baldwin as its nominee for Vice-President. Although the Constitution Party was on fewer state ballots in 2004, the vote tally increased by 40 percent compared to the 2000 elections while other ‚Äòalternative‚Äô parties lost ground or barely matched their 2000 vote totals.2008: At its Kansas City, Missouri national convention, the Constitution Party nominated its 2004 nominee for Vice President, Chuck Baldwin of Florida, to be its 2008 nominee for President, selecting attorney and Constitution Party activist Darrell Castle of Tennessee, to serve as the Vice-presidential nominee.2012: Former six-term Virginia Congressman, Virgil Goode, was nominated for President at the Constitution Party National Convention held in Nashville, Tennessee. Three-term Constitution Party National Chairman, attorney Jim Clymer of Pennsylvania, was nominated to serve as Goode‚Äôs running mate.2016: Founding Constitution Party member, three term Vice-chairman of the National Committee of the Constitution Party, and 2008 Constitution Party Vice-presidential Candidate Darrell Castle was nominated for President. Mr. Castle‚Äôs running mate was Dr. Scott Bradley of Utah who holds a PhD in Constitutional Law. The campaign garnered over 200,000 votes setting a Constitution Party record.

_source.content: Mar-a-Lago 'Raid': Two-Tiered Justice?The problem is the appearance of a two-tiered system of justice, one pertaining to Trump and the other pertaining to laws or subpoenas allegedly violated by top Democratic officials like then-President Barack Obama's Attorney General Eric Holder, who refused to comply with a congressional subpoena and became the only sitting AG to be found in criminal contempt of Congress; IRS official Lois Lerner, accused of withholding the granting of tax-exempt status to conservative charities and who refused to comply with a congressional subpoena; the treatment of Bill Clinton's National Security Adviser Sandy Berger, who removed and destroyed documents from the National Archives in 2003; and Secretary of State Hillary Clinton for her alleged violation of the Espionage Act.http://174.138.51.92/cols/elder081822.php3
_source.contentraw:
Mar-a-Lago 'Raid': Two-Tiered Justice?

The problem is the appearance of a two-tiered system of justice, one pertaining to Trump and the other pertaining to laws or subpoenas allegedly violated by top Democratic officials like then-President Barack Obama's Attorney General Eric Holder, who refused to comply with a congressional subpoena and became the only sitting AG to be found in criminal contempt of Congress; IRS official Lois Lerner, accused of withholding the granting of tax-exempt status to conservative charities and who refused to comply with a congressional subpoena; the treatment of Bill Clinton's National Security Adviser Sandy Berger, who removed and destroyed documents from the National Archives in 2003; and Secretary of State Hillary Clinton for her alleged violation of the Espionage Act.

card.description: We all grew up understanding the maxim,"if at first you don't succeed, try, try again." However, that maxim was intended to provide encouragement to learn from previous failures while showing
card.title: If At First You Don't Succeed...Keep Doing Stupid Stuff

_source.content: https://townhall.com/columnists/allenwest/2022/08/15/if-at-first-you-dont-succeed-n2611726This past week gave us another episode of "Lifestyles of the Stuck on Stupid". There can be no debate on the subject, the leftist gremlins in America want Donald Trump gone. And much the same as Wylie Coyote, they just can't seem to succeed at their intended objective.First, we were fed a constant nonstop diet of Russia collusion. Congressman Eric Swalwell went so far as to assert that Donald Trump was a Russian agent, while the Dems ignored Swalwell‚Äôs relationship with a Chinese spy named Fang Fang. No, you can't make this stuff up. Who will ever forget the dubious Adam Schiff and his incessant rantings about how they had Trump. There was the infamous Steele dossier that was produced and paid for by the Hillary Clinton campaign, "I am Hillary Clinton and I approve this stupidity."

_source.contentraw:
New York City Mayor Eric Adams criticized Texas Gov. Greg Abbott's office for not "communicating" the details of the buses being sent to New York City.

"They're not letting us know when the buses are leaving. They're not letting us know what are the needs of the people on the bus. They are not giving us any information so we're unable to really provide the service to people en route," Adams said. "We would like to get that information."

TEXAS DOESN'T HAVE TO. THESE ARE ILLEGAL BORDER CROSSERS. DEPORT THEM.

Mr. Adams, how do you think the American people feel about the Biden Admin?

Bless Abbott for just following policy set forth by the administration in front of him. You get what you serve. üñï

I'm sure Central Park has plenty of room for pop-up tents and portable toilets. Illegals might vote, but they don't have to pay taxes. Relish in that thought.

card.title: Trump's Staff Reveals Absurd Demand FBI Made During Mar-a-Lago Raid - And They Were Gloriously Shut Down

_source.content: Trump‚Äôs Team Rejected FBI‚Äôs Requests To Turn Off Mar-a-Lago‚Äôs Cameras During RaidFormer President Donald Trump revealed how one major FBI demand was foiled during the Mar-a-Lago raid of his Florida estate just over a week ago.‚ÄúIn the Raid of Mar-a-Lago, the FBI demanded that all security cameras be turned off. What is that all about? We said no!‚Äù Trump said in a post on his Truth Social platform.One of Trump‚Äôs lawyers, Christina Bobb, revealed that the cameras were not turned off at Mar-a-Lago despite multiple requests from FBI agents.AdvertisementAs such, Trump and his family, who were in their Trump Tower residence at the time of the raid, could watch what was taking place.‚ÄúI think the folks in New York ‚Äî President Trump and his family ‚Äî probably had a better view than I did because they had the CCTV, but they were able to watch. I was stuck in the parking lot there to collect paper and answer questions,‚Äù she said.‚ÄúBut they were actually able to see the whole thing, so they actually have a better idea of what took place inside,‚Äù she said.‚ÄúSo initially, [the agents] said you need to turn off all the cameras, and then, of course, the staff complied,‚Äù she added.‚ÄúThen the lawyers jumped in and said, you actually don‚Äôt have to turn them off. So shortly after they turn them back on. So the cameras were only off for a very short period of time,‚Äù she said.Learn more about JeengEric Trump said he encountered people who are furious about the FBI raid of Mar-a-Lago and has some information that the family is going to share.Appearing on Fox News, Eric Trump told host Sean Hannity that they ignored the FBI‚Äôs request to take off the surveillance cameras and that they have video of the search.‚ÄúWill you ‚Äî you still have the surveillance tape, is that correct? Will you ‚Äî are you allowed to share that with the country?‚Äù the host said.‚ÄúAbsolutely, Sean. At the right time,‚Äù the son of the 45th President of the United States said.‚ÄúThat‚Äôs why cops wear body cams. They don‚Äôt tell you to turn off cameras. They want transparency. And that‚Äôs not what happened here,‚Äù he said.‚ÄúAnd you know for a fact they asked for the cameras to be turned off,‚Äù the host said.‚ÄúThey asked for the cameras to be turned off,‚Äù Eric said.He said after the raid that ‚Äúmy father‚Äôs poll numbers have absolutely gone through the roof.‚ÄùRead morehttps://conservativebrief.com/trump-fbi-65669/?utm_source=Conservativebrief.com&utm_medium=Push
_source.contentraw:
Trump‚Äôs Team Rejected FBI‚Äôs Requests To Turn Off Mar-a-Lago‚Äôs Cameras During Raid

Former President Donald Trump revealed how one major FBI demand was foiled during the Mar-a-Lago raid of his Florida estate just over a week ago.

‚ÄúIn the Raid of Mar-a-Lago, the FBI demanded that all security cameras be turned off. What is that all about? We said no!‚Äù Trump said in a post on his Truth Social platform.

One of Trump‚Äôs lawyers, Christina Bobb, revealed that the cameras were not turned off at Mar-a-Lago despite multiple requests from FBI agents.
Advertisement

As such, Trump and his family, who were in their Trump Tower residence at the time of the raid, could watch what was taking place.

‚ÄúI think the folks in New York ‚Äî President Trump and his family ‚Äî probably had a better view than I did because they had the CCTV, but they were able to watch. I was stuck in the parking lot there to collect paper and answer questions,‚Äù she said.

‚ÄúBut they were actually able to see the whole thing, so they actually have a better idea of what took place inside,‚Äù she said.

‚ÄúSo initially, [the agents] said you need to turn off all the cameras, and then, of course, the staff complied,‚Äù she added.

‚ÄúThen the lawyers jumped in and said, you actually don‚Äôt have to turn them off. So shortly after they turn them back on. So the cameras were only off for a very short period of time,‚Äù she said.
Learn more about Jeeng

Eric Trump said he encountered people who are furious about the FBI raid of Mar-a-Lago and has some information that the family is going to share.

Appearing on Fox News, Eric Trump told host Sean Hannity that they ignored the FBI‚Äôs request to take off the surveillance cameras and that they have video of the search.

‚ÄúWill you ‚Äî you still have the surveillance tape, is that correct? Will you ‚Äî are you allowed to share that with the country?‚Äù the host said.

‚ÄúAbsolutely, Sean. At the right time,‚Äù the son of the 45th President of the United States said.

‚ÄúThat‚Äôs why cops wear body cams. They don‚Äôt tell you to turn off cameras. They want transparency. And that‚Äôs not what happened here,‚Äù he said.

‚ÄúAnd you know for a fact they asked for the cameras to be turned off,‚Äù the host said.

‚ÄúThey asked for the cameras to be turned off,‚Äù Eric said.

He said after the raid that ‚Äúmy father‚Äôs poll numbers have absolutely gone through the roof.‚Äù

Read more

https://conservativebrief.com/trump-fbi-65669/?utm_source=Conservativebrief.com&utm_medium=Push

card.title: NYC to Give 6K Luxury Hotel Rooms to Border Crossers as Rents Skyrocket for Americans

_source.content: NYC To Give 6K Luxury Hotel Rooms to Border Crossers as Rents Skyrocket for Americans by JOHN BINDER 8-17-22New York City officials are hoping to provide a total of nearly 6,000 luxury hotel rooms to border crossers arriving on buses from Texas even as rents for city residents skyrocket to unsustainable prices.For weeks, Texas Gov. Greg Abbott (R) has sent buses filled with border crossers to New York City ‚Äî a rigorous sanctuary city that shields and protects illegal aliens from arrest and deportation by the Immigration and Customs Enforcement (ICE) agency.Emma-Jo Morris / Breitbart NewsMayor Eric Adams (D), a supporter of the city‚Äôs sanctuary policy, has called on New Yorkers to get ‚Äúon board‚Äù with waves of illegal immigration sent to New York City while also calling the migrant buses ‚Äúhorrific‚Äù and suggesting he will retaliate against Abbott.Adams, according to the New York Post, is planning a housing initiative that would provide nearly 6,000 luxury hotel rooms to border crossers arriving on the buses.The Post reports:There is no price tag attached to the request that was released Wednesday, which was made under the emergency contracting powers invoked by Mayor Eric Adams when the migrant crisis first began in the city. [Emphasis added]The Department of Homeless Services had previously asked nonprofit social service providers to send in proposals to rent rooms and provide aid for 600 families set to be housed in a luxury Midtown hotel, the Row NYC on 8th Avenue. [Emphasis added]And it would come on top of the estimated 200 already secured and providing housing for families at the Skyline Hotel on 10th Avenue. [Emphasis added]NYC Mayor's Office The housing plan for border crossers comes as rents for New York City residents have skyrocketed to levels that are pushing working and middle class communities further out of the area.A recent analysis from Street Easy revealed that about 34 percent of apartments listed in New York City today opened only after tenants were forced out as a result of massive rent increases.In June, rents across New York City hit an average of $3,500 a month. By borough, the average rent for a one-bedroom apartment in Manhattan is now $4,100, the average rent in Brooklyn is now well over $3,000 a month, and the average rent in Queens is now around $2,500 a month.Real estate investors are some of the biggest beneficiaries of mass immigration to the United States. Immigration-driven population growth, set to bring the U.S. population to more than 400 million residents by 2060, is likely to send housing prices even higher. [rest @ link] https://www.breitbart.com/politics/2022/08/17/nyc-to-give-6k-luxury-hotel-rooms-to-border-crossers-as-rents-skyrocket-for-americans/
_source.contentraw:
NYC To Give 6K Luxury Hotel Rooms to Border Crossers as Rents Skyrocket for Americans by JOHN BINDER 8-17-22

New York City officials are hoping to provide a total of nearly 6,000 luxury hotel rooms to border crossers arriving on buses from Texas even as rents for city residents skyrocket to unsustainable prices.

For weeks, Texas Gov. Greg Abbott (R) has sent buses filled with border crossers to New York City ‚Äî a rigorous sanctuary city that shields and protects illegal aliens from arrest and deportation by the Immigration and Customs Enforcement (ICE) agency.

Emma-Jo Morris / Breitbart News
Mayor Eric Adams (D), a supporter of the city‚Äôs sanctuary policy, has called on New Yorkers to get ‚Äúon board‚Äù with waves of illegal immigration sent to New York City while also calling the migrant buses ‚Äúhorrific‚Äù and suggesting he will retaliate against Abbott.

Adams, according to the New York Post, is planning a housing initiative that would provide nearly 6,000 luxury hotel rooms to border crossers arriving on the buses.

The Post reports:

There is no price tag attached to the request that was released Wednesday, which was made under the emergency contracting powers invoked by Mayor Eric Adams when the migrant crisis first began in the city. [Emphasis added]

The Department of Homeless Services had previously asked nonprofit social service providers to send in proposals to rent rooms and provide aid for 600 families set to be housed in a luxury Midtown hotel, the Row NYC on 8th Avenue. [Emphasis added]

And it would come on top of the estimated 200 already secured and providing housing for families at the Skyline Hotel on 10th Avenue. [Emphasis added]

NYC Mayor's Office
The housing plan for border crossers comes as rents for New York City residents have skyrocketed to levels that are pushing working and middle class communities further out of the area.

A recent analysis from Street Easy revealed that about 34 percent of apartments listed in New York City today opened only after tenants were forced out as a result of massive rent increases.

In June, rents across New York City hit an average of $3,500 a month. By borough, the average rent for a one-bedroom apartment in Manhattan is now $4,100, the average rent in Brooklyn is now well over $3,000 a month, and the average rent in Queens is now around $2,500 a month.

Real estate investors are some of the biggest beneficiaries of mass immigration to the United States. Immigration-driven population growth, set to bring the U.S. population to more than 400 million residents by 2060, is likely to send housing prices even higher. [rest @ link]

card.title: Identit√© num√©rique qu√©b√©coise reconnue partout au Canada d‚Äôici quatre ans, dit Caire

_source.content: As a reminderJune 2022Quebec digital identity to be recognized across Canada within four years, says CaireEvery Quebecer will soon carry his or her digital identity in their cell phone. And within four years, it will be recognized across Canada, predicts Minister Eric Caire.[...]Eight ministers representing the Government of Canada, six provinces and one territory were gathered Thursday and Friday in Quebec City, in a hotel on the Grande All√©e. They met on the sidelines of the first conference on cybersecurity and digital organized by the Government of Quebec. They were accompanied by senior officials.In addition to Minister Caire, whose official ministry is only six months old, and Treasury Board of Canada President Mona Fortier, ministers from British Columbia, Alberta, Saskatchewan, Prince Edward Island, Newfoundland and Labrador, and Nunavut were in attendance. Minister Fortier participated virtually, she has COVID.In a future mandateAll agreed to make this meeting an annual meeting of Ministers of Cyber Security or those responsible for the file. As do their federal, provincial and territorial colleagues in Finance, Agriculture, Health or Education. It is already known that the next ministerial meeting, in 2023, will be held in British Columbia.Mr. Caire confirmed that Ontario, the largest province and absent from the Quebec City meeting because it had just held an election, is already sort of part of the adventure. Manitoba, New Brunswick and Nova Scotia will also follow suit, the Quebec minister believes.A first block of digital identity rollouts will take place in Quebec, Ontario and British Columbia by the end of the summer.But how long before all of Canada is covered? To have your digital identity recognized and verified in a hotel in Whistler as well as in Old Quebec, Flin Flon or Halifax?[...]Increased protectionAlso the minister responsible for Access to Information and Privacy, Eric Caire sees this digital identity as a way to protect personal information, not the other way around.Such a tool will make it possible to disclose only the information needed by the person in front of us and not our entire pedigree," he says. For example, at the Soci√©t√© qu√©b√©coise du cannabis (SQDC) clerk, the client will only be able to confirm that he is over 21 years old and not to disclose all the contents of his driver's license, such as his name, address, age, etc. The same goes for the ecocenter greeter, who really only needs to know your city of residence, not more.[...]The Quebec general election is on October 3. Mr. Caire is MNA for the Quebec City riding of La Peltrie for the Coalition avenir Qu√©bec (CAQ).https://www.lesoleil.com/2022/06/17/identite-numerique-quebecoise-reconnue-partout-au-canada-dici-quatre-ans-dit-caire-78764a847d6f39bcadbd658f137d5006
_source.contentraw:
As a reminder

June 2022
Quebec digital identity to be recognized across Canada within four years, says Caire

Every Quebecer will soon carry his or her digital identity in their cell phone. And within four years, it will be recognized across Canada, predicts Minister Eric Caire.
[...]
Eight ministers representing the Government of Canada, six provinces and one territory were gathered Thursday and Friday in Quebec City, in a hotel on the Grande All√©e. They met on the sidelines of the first conference on cybersecurity and digital organized by the Government of Quebec. They were accompanied by senior officials.

In addition to Minister Caire, whose official ministry is only six months old, and Treasury Board of Canada President Mona Fortier, ministers from British Columbia, Alberta, Saskatchewan, Prince Edward Island, Newfoundland and Labrador, and Nunavut were in attendance. Minister Fortier participated virtually, she has COVID.

In a future mandate
All agreed to make this meeting an annual meeting of Ministers of Cyber Security or those responsible for the file. As do their federal, provincial and territorial colleagues in Finance, Agriculture, Health or Education. It is already known that the next ministerial meeting, in 2023, will be held in British Columbia.

Mr. Caire confirmed that Ontario, the largest province and absent from the Quebec City meeting because it had just held an election, is already sort of part of the adventure. Manitoba, New Brunswick and Nova Scotia will also follow suit, the Quebec minister believes.

A first block of digital identity rollouts will take place in Quebec, Ontario and British Columbia by the end of the summer.

But how long before all of Canada is covered? To have your digital identity recognized and verified in a hotel in Whistler as well as in Old Quebec, Flin Flon or Halifax?
[...]
Increased protection
Also the minister responsible for Access to Information and Privacy, Eric Caire sees this digital identity as a way to protect personal information, not the other way around.

Such a tool will make it possible to disclose only the information needed by the person in front of us and not our entire pedigree," he says. For example, at the Soci√©t√© qu√©b√©coise du cannabis (SQDC) clerk, the client will only be able to confirm that he is over 21 years old and not to disclose all the contents of his driver's license, such as his name, address, age, etc. The same goes for the ecocenter greeter, who really only needs to know your city of residence, not more.
[...]
The Quebec general election is on October 3. Mr. Caire is MNA for the Quebec City riding of La Peltrie for the Coalition avenir Qu√©bec (CAQ).

https://www.lesoleil.com/2022/06/17/identite-numerique-quebecoise-reconnue-partout-au-canada-dici-quatre-ans-dit-caire-78764a847d6f39bcadbd658f137d5006

So haben etwa die D√§nen neulich nachgerechnet und herausgefunden, da√ü die Neger und Muselmannen stets weitaus mehr Geld vom Staat erhalten als sie diesem einbringen. https://exxpress.at/daenemark-migranten-aus-islamischen-laendern-erhalten-mehr-als-sie-einzahlen Sprich, je mehr wir Deutschen also durch diese verdr√§ngt werden, desto weniger leistungsf√§hig wird die Volkswirtschaft des deutschen Rumpfstaates sein. Dabei haben wir gro√üe Vorr√§te an Stein- und Braunkohle, welche mehrere Jahrhunderte unseren Bedarf decken k√∂nnten, im eigenen Land. group.description: ‚ÄûWas ist der ‚Äûhundertprozentige‚Äú Amerikanismus? Ein nach dem unteren Durchschnitt genormtes Massedasein, eine primitive Pose oder ein Versprechen der Zukunft? Sicher ist, da√ü es hier bisher weder ein wirkliches Volk noch einen wirklichen Staat gibt. K√∂nnen sich beide durch ein hartes Schicksal noch herausbilden oder schlie√üt das der Typus des Kolonialmenschen aus, dessen seelische Vergangenheit anderswo lag und abgestorben ist? Der Amerikaner redet wie der Engl√§nder nicht von Staat oder Vaterland, sondern von this country. In der Tat handelt es sich um ein unerme√üliches Gebiet und um eine von Stadt zu Stadt schweifende Bev√∂lkerung von Trappern, die in ihm auf die Dollarjagd gehen, r√ºcksichtslos und ungebunden, denn das Gesetz ist nur f√ºr den da, der nicht schlau oder m√§chtig genug ist, es zu verachten. Die √Ñhnlichkeit mit dem bolschewistischen Ru√üland ist viel gr√∂√üer als man denkt: Dieselbe Weite der Landschaft, die jeden erfolgreichen Angriff eines Gegners und damit das Erlebnis wirklicher nationaler Gefahr ausschlie√üt und so den Staat entbehrlich macht, infolge davon aber auch ein echt politisches Denken nicht entstehen l√§√üt. Das Leben ist ausschlie√ülich wirtschaftlich gestaltet und entbehrt deshalb der Tiefe, um so mehr als ihm das Element der echten geschichtlichen Tragik, das gro√üe Schicksal fehlt, das die Seele der abendl√§ndischen V√∂lker durch Jahrhunderte vertieft und erzogen hat. Die Religion, urspr√ºnglich ein strenger Puritanismus, ist eine Art von pflichtgem√§√üer Unterhaltung geworden und der Krieg war ein neuer Sport. Und dieselbe Diktatur der √∂ffentlichen Meinung hier und dort, ob sie nun parteim√§√üig oder gesellschaftlich vorgeschrieben ist, die sich auf alles erstreckt, was im Abendland dem Willen des einzelnen freigestellt ist, Flirt und Kirchgang, Schuhe und Schminke, Modet√§nze und Moderomane, das Denken, Essen und Vergn√ºgen. Alles ist f√ºr alle gleich. Es gibt einen nach K√∂rper, Kleidung und Seele genormten Typus des Amerikaners und vor allem der Amerikanerin, und wer sich dagegen auflehnt, wer das √∂ffentlich zu kritisieren wagt, verf√§llt der allgemeinen √Ñchtung, in New York wie in Moskau. Und endlich findet sich eine fast russische Form des Staatssozialismus oder Staatskapitalismus, dargestellt durch die Masse der Trusts, die den russischen Wirtschaftsverwaltungen entsprechend Produktion und Absatz bis ins einzelne planm√§√üig normen und leiten. Sie sind die eigentlichen Herren des Landes, hier wie dort.‚Äú (Oswald Spengler, ‚ÄûJahre der Entscheidung‚Äú)

_source.content: 1 of 2 -There are literally dozens of each, cults and false religions. Some of the more mainstream of these who tend to focus on that ‚Äúsalvation by works‚Äù stuff (despite Matthew 5:13-16, Isaiah 64:6, Ephesians 2:8-10 and Titus 3:4-8) are (on the cult side) Seventh Day Adventism, Jehovah‚Äôs Witnesses, Mormons, the Hebrew Roots Movement and Roman Catholicism. On the false religions side, it‚Äôs Judaism which denies Jesus as The Messiah, again the Hebrew Roots Movement and again Roman Catholicism. (The Hebrew Roots Movement as well as Roman Catholicism are both a cult AND a false religion, Biblically-speaking.) Sadly, Matthew 7:21-23, Galatians 3:1-3 and 2 Timothy 3:5 are STELLAR descriptions of cults and false religions.A ‚Äúcult‚Äù is deemed so because it claims to have faith in Jesus (wrong ‚ÄúJesus‚Äù, but that‚Äôs another story), quote Scripture passages (WAY out of Biblical context) and fails to follow Him and Him ALONE. Additionally, there are no contradictions in Scripture‚Ä¶EVER. They do a good job of telling people about Jesus but fail to teach anyone about the finished work of Jesus or His Resurrection. There‚Äôs ALWAYS someone else as a ‚Äúleader‚Äù. Examples: Charles ‚ÄúTaze‚Äù Russell of Jehovah‚Äôs Witnesses, Moses of the Hebrew Roots Movement (an offshoot of the false religion of Judaism), the pope/a priest/Mary of Roman Catholicism, Mary Baker Eddy of Christian Science, Joseph Smith of Latter Day Saints, L. Ron Hubbard of Scientology, Ellen White of Seventh Day Adventism, Eric vonAnderseck of Second Eighth Week Apostles and so on.(SIDE NOTE: Both the Hebrew Roots Movement and Roman Catholicism are both a cult AND a false religion, Biblically-speaking.)The wrong ‚ÄúJesus‚Äù exists in ANY cult which includes those ‚Äúsalvation by works‚Äù people. It‚Äôs totally impossible to ‚Äúearn a gift‚Äù. No ‚ÄúJesus‚Äù in false religions. One doesn‚Äôt HAVE TO do things pertaining to Christianity, he or she GETS to. HUMONGOUS difference.)Christianity doesn‚Äôt teach anything like either ‚Äúsalvation by works‚Äù or ‚Äúreligion‚Äù (see Romans 6:23 for more information). Additionally, Scripture is BEYOND clear in 2 Corinthians 5:8 (absent with the body = present with The Lord).By contrast, salvation is ‚ÄúJust Jesus. No artificial anything‚Äù. (‚ÄúThe Gospel ONLY‚Äù, in other words ‚Äì Keyword: ‚ÄúONLY‚Äù). Someone born again (or ‚Äúborn from above‚Äù ‚Äì or ‚Äúborn anew‚Äù ‚Äì John 3:1-6 ‚Äì https://biblehub.com/greek/509.htm ) is only qualified to teach the new covenant (see 2 Corinthians 3:4-11 for more information). Forever‚Äôs a long time.

There are literally dozens of each, cults and false religions. Some of the more mainstream of these who tend to focus on that ‚Äúsalvation by works‚Äù stuff (despite Matthew 5:13-16, Isaiah 64:6, Ephesians 2:8-10 and Titus 3:4-8) are (on the cult side) Seventh Day Adventism, Jehovah‚Äôs Witnesses, Mormons, the Hebrew Roots Movement and Roman Catholicism. On the false religions side, it‚Äôs Judaism which denies Jesus as The Messiah, again the Hebrew Roots Movement and again Roman Catholicism. (The Hebrew Roots Movement as well as Roman Catholicism are both a cult AND a false religion, Biblically-speaking.) Sadly, Matthew 7:21-23, Galatians 3:1-3 and 2 Timothy 3:5 are STELLAR descriptions of cults and false religions.

A ‚Äúcult‚Äù is deemed so because it claims to have faith in Jesus (wrong ‚ÄúJesus‚Äù, but that‚Äôs another story), quote Scripture passages (WAY out of Biblical context) and fails to follow Him and Him ALONE. Additionally, there are no contradictions in Scripture‚Ä¶EVER. They do a good job of telling people about Jesus but fail to teach anyone about the finished work of Jesus or His Resurrection. There‚Äôs ALWAYS someone else as a ‚Äúleader‚Äù. Examples: Charles ‚ÄúTaze‚Äù Russell of Jehovah‚Äôs Witnesses, Moses of the Hebrew Roots Movement (an offshoot of the false religion of Judaism), the pope/a priest/Mary of Roman Catholicism, Mary Baker Eddy of Christian Science, Joseph Smith of Latter Day Saints, L. Ron Hubbard of Scientology, Ellen White of Seventh Day Adventism, Eric vonAnderseck of Second Eighth Week Apostles and so on.
(SIDE NOTE: Both the Hebrew Roots Movement and Roman Catholicism are both a cult AND a false religion, Biblically-speaking.)

The wrong ‚ÄúJesus‚Äù exists in ANY cult which includes those ‚Äúsalvation by works‚Äù people. It‚Äôs totally impossible to ‚Äúearn a gift‚Äù. No ‚ÄúJesus‚Äù in false religions. One doesn‚Äôt HAVE TO do things pertaining to Christianity, he or she GETS to. HUMONGOUS difference.)
Christianity doesn‚Äôt teach anything like either ‚Äúsalvation by works‚Äù or ‚Äúreligion‚Äù (see Romans 6:23 for more information). Additionally, Scripture is BEYOND clear in 2 Corinthians 5:8 (absent with the body = present with The Lord).

By contrast, salvation is ‚ÄúJust Jesus. No artificial anything‚Äù. (‚ÄúThe Gospel ONLY‚Äù, in other words ‚Äì Keyword: ‚ÄúONLY‚Äù). Someone born again (or ‚Äúborn from above‚Äù ‚Äì or ‚Äúborn anew‚Äù ‚Äì John 3:1-6 ‚Äì https://biblehub.com/greek/509.htm ) is only qualified to teach the new covenant (see 2 Corinthians 3:4-11 for more information).
